extendedInfo.description: New version does not expire. Enjoy!!Welcome aboard the Dream Cruise!Take a ride of the Cruise Line around the city on the lake. The billboards in the streets will host your pictures. The cruise will serve your choice of drink. See dolphin jumping. Control speed of the cruise. City will host fireworks just for you.* Billboards pick pictures from your phone gallery.* Tap on water to see dolphin jumping.* Tap on table to change the drink.* Tap on Life Saver Ring to change speed of the Cruise.* Tap on the Sky to see fireworks. City will dim lights during fireworks.* Optional Settings* Option to choose your own pictures folder to be displayed on billboards.* Tap on Billboards and see your pictures zoomed in.Let us know what else you would like to see in the Wallpaper and we will implement it.  Currently supports only 480x800 and 480x854 resolution phones only.

reviews.title: Great Wallpaper
reviews.comment: Very good, but the shadow of the table looks ugly, the pictures not fit to the billboard frame, and makes my phone run slow. I have no problem when using it on my samsubg galaxy S, but it is not the same on my galaxy S3 for now. Tks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not work properly
reviews.comment: I first used it in my samsung galaxy s2 and it works very good in samsung galaxy s2 but now i have galaxy s3 and it was not works properly in galaxy s3 please give me solution?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cool app. To open, you need to go to the live wallpaper gallery. I just wish I could change the city\'s color and the sky had a better gradient.
